descriptionlist.description:
Five little homescreen widgets matching Stencil theme. Requires Infostats2 to function and one of many other tweaks to actually display the widgets!
Includes two now playing variants, an icon sized weather widget, and two agenda widgets, each with loads of customisation options.
And a special OCD wallpaper to help you line them up with your icon layout.

changelog.change: Initial and almost definitely final release
